scripts.start: concurrently " npm run watch:scss" "npm run dev "
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin registrarse.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/registrarse.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin equipos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/equipos.html && usemin ligas.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/ligas.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
